nodes.title: The Ashley
nodes.description: Modest yet magnificent, The Ashley engagement ring has a slender 1.5mm band that amplifies the size and sparkle of the center stone, turning it into a major showpiece. Four delicate claw prongs secure the gem in place and emphasize its low-profile silhouette. The clean lines, striking details, and modest geometry of this spectacular solitaire are both classic and oh-so modern.

nodes.description: The Alison is a solitaire engagement ring that exudes timeless elegance and showcases the dazzling beauty of its diamond centerpiece. With a slim band and delicate petal prongs, its modest design emphasizes the size and sparkle of the diamond, making it the true star of the show. Crafted with exquisite attention to detail, The Alison is the perfect symbol of your perfect love and dedication. Present her with this stunning ring and it will take her breath away every time she beholds it.

nodes.title: The Twig
nodes.description: Introducing The Twig, Keyzar's flagship engagement ring, inspired by the idea of adding new branches to your family tree. This exquisite piece features a dainty, twig-like band that gently caresses the wearer's ring finger, symbolizing growth and connection. The soft accents add a subtle sparkle, while the delicate band beautifully emphasizes the size and brilliance of the center stone. The Twig is a perfect blend of nature's elegance and modern sophistication, making it a timeless choice for celebrating your love and commitment.

nodes.title: The Textured Twig
nodes.description: Introducing the Textured Twig engagement ring—a fresh reimagining of our iconic Twig design. This exquisite piece features a rough-finished band that beautifully replicates the natural texture of a wooden branch, symbolizing the growth of new branches on your family tree. Delicate accents emphasize the band's intricate details and thin, crisp lines, drawing the eye to the stunning center stone. The Textured Twig is a perfect blend of nature-inspired beauty and refined elegance, making it a unique and meaningful choice for your special moment.

nodes.title: The Penelope
nodes.description: The Penelope is a stunning masterpiece with a delicate, thin band that exudes elegance and sophistication. The shoulders of the ring are adorned with six pave-set accents, adding a touch of brilliance, while four low-profile micro diamonds in the bridge area enhance its allure. This slender design offers just the right amount of flash and pizzazz, gracefully drawing attention to the dazzling center stone. The Penelope is the epitome of refined beauty, perfect for celebrating your unique love story. * For small finger sizes, two diamonds will flank each side.

nodes.title: The Nelly
nodes.description: The Nelly is a hidden halo solitaire engagement ring with a surprising twist. You can see the whole center stone, held high by four claws. The pave-set diamond hidden halo is directly underneath the girdle and right above the dainty band. A tasteful choice if you want to show off your center stone while illuminating it from underneath.

Its hidden halo surrounds the center stone ever so slightly, adding interest and sparkle from every angle while accenting the low-profile silhouette. Its four claw prongs hold the gem tightly in place while giving space for all that glorious sparkle.

nodes.title: The Razor Kamellie
nodes.description: The Razor Kamellie engagement ring takes our classic solitaire design to the next level with a refined, modern twist. Featuring a sleek, slim knife-edge band that seamlessly connects to a hidden halo beneath the center stone, this ring exudes understated elegance. Its minimal design allows the center diamond to shine while the hidden halo adds a touch of subtle brilliance, making it perfect for those who appreciate simplicity with a hint of grandeur.

nodes.title: The Alex
nodes.description: The Alex, a stunning solitaire, features a smooth classic design. Its seamless band slips delicately onto the finger while its timeless four-prong design lifts the center stone, allowing light to enter from all angles for maximum shine. The high-set stone is cradled in a hidden halo, adding mesmerizing sparkle and glamorous appeal from all angles. This clean, high-rise design is perfectly smooth simplicity worn on its own and ideal for stacking down the line.

Perfect for those who appreciate both classic beauty and innovative craftsmanship.

With every move, every glint, The Victoria tells a story of deep affection, passion, and an unyielding bond.

nodes.title: The Natalie
nodes.description: The Natalie is a captivating cathedral solitaire engagement ring that combines timeless design with thoughtful details. Twin rows of pave-set diamonds shine brilliantly, serving as graceful bridge accents to complement the polished band. A hidden halo cradles the center stone beneath four delicate claw prongs, adding a touch of unexpected sparkle. The smooth-polish band pairs seamlessly with other Keyzar pieces, making The Natalie a stunning symbol of love and versatility.

nodes.description: Modest yet magnificent, The Ashley engagement ring has a slender 1.5mm band that amplifies the size and sparkle of the center stone, turning it into a major showpiece. Four delicate claw prongs secure the gem in place and emphasize its low-profile silhouette. The clean lines, striking details, and modest geometry of this spectacular solitaire are both classic and oh-so modern.

nodes.description: Introducing The Twig, Keyzar's flagship engagement ring, inspired by the idea of adding new branches to your family tree. This exquisite piece features a dainty, twig-like band that gently caresses the wearer's ring finger, symbolizing growth and connection. The soft accents add a subtle sparkle, while the delicate band beautifully emphasizes the size and brilliance of the center stone. The Twig is a perfect blend of nature's elegance and modern sophistication, making it a timeless choice for celebrating your love and commitment.

nodes.title: The Kamellie
nodes.description: Discover The Kamellie, a Keyzar bestseller that epitomizes timeless elegance. This exquisite solitaire engagement ring features a sleek and slender band that offers a modern touch while ensuring the center stone remains the star. What sets The Kamellie apart is its hidden halo, adding a secret sparkle that enhances the ring's brilliance without overpowering its classic design. Perfect for those who appreciate the subtle sophistication, The Kamellie is a beautiful testament to your enduring love.

nodes.description: Introducing The Sarah, a solitaire engagement ring that radiates timeless charm. Its classic design is elevated by a high-profile setting, creating a sleek and elegant silhouette that is perfect for daily wear and pairs seamlessly with other rings in a stack. Its refined simplicity allows the true beauty of the stone to shine, symbolizing a love that's pure and enduring. The delicate band enhances the diamond's brilliance without overpowering it, lending an understated elegance that transcends fleeting trends.

nodes.title: The Textured Twig
nodes.description: Introducing the Textured Twig engagement ring—a fresh reimagining of our iconic Twig design. This exquisite piece features a rough-finished band that beautifully replicates the natural texture of a wooden branch, symbolizing the growth of new branches on your family tree. Delicate accents emphasize the band's intricate details and thin, crisp lines, drawing the eye to the stunning center stone. The Textured Twig is a perfect blend of nature-inspired beauty and refined elegance, making it a unique and meaningful choice for your special moment.

nodes.title: The Penelope
nodes.description: The Penelope is a stunning masterpiece with a delicate, thin band that exudes elegance and sophistication. The shoulders of the ring are adorned with six pave-set accents, adding a touch of brilliance, while four low-profile micro diamonds in the bridge area enhance its allure. This slender design offers just the right amount of flash and pizzazz, gracefully drawing attention to the dazzling center stone. The Penelope is the epitome of refined beauty, perfect for celebrating your unique love story. * For small finger sizes, two diamonds will flank each side.

nodes.title: The Razor Kamellie
nodes.description: The Razor Kamellie engagement ring takes our classic solitaire design to the next level with a refined, modern twist. Featuring a sleek, slim knife-edge band that seamlessly connects to a hidden halo beneath the center stone, this ring exudes understated elegance. Its minimal design allows the center diamond to shine while the hidden halo adds a touch of subtle brilliance, making it perfect for those who appreciate simplicity with a hint of grandeur.

nodes.title: The Alex
nodes.description: The Alex, a stunning solitaire, features a smooth classic design. Its seamless band slips delicately onto the finger while its timeless four-prong design lifts the center stone, allowing light to enter from all angles for maximum shine. The high-set stone is cradled in a hidden halo, adding mesmerizing sparkle and glamorous appeal from all angles. This clean, high-rise design is perfectly smooth simplicity worn on its own and ideal for stacking down the line.

nodes.title: The Berta
nodes.description: Introducing The Berta, a solitaire engagement ring that redefines elegance and sophistication. The unique band curves gracefully around the bottom of the center stone, cradling it in a gentle embrace. This distinctive feature not only enhances the brilliance of the stone but also adds a touch of artistic flair, making the ring stand out in a sea of traditional designs. Perfect for those who appreciate both classic beauty and innovative craftsmanship.

nodes.title: The Victoria
nodes.description: Step into the world of unparalleled elegance with The Victoria, an engagement ring that effortlessly merges classic simplicity with modern sparkle sophistication. At its heart lies a captivating center stone, magnificently embraced by round brilliant diamonds that amplify its luminosity. Each diamond meticulously set around the centerpiece serves as a beacon, drawing the eye and reflecting light in a dance of shimmering brilliance. With every move, every glint, The Victoria tells a story of deep affection, passion, and an unyielding bond.

nodes.title: The Natalie
nodes.description: The Natalie is a captivating cathedral solitaire engagement ring that combines timeless design with thoughtful details. Twin rows of pave-set diamonds shine brilliantly, serving as graceful bridge accents to complement the polished band. A hidden halo cradles the center stone beneath four delicate claw prongs, adding a touch of unexpected sparkle. The smooth-polish band pairs seamlessly with other Keyzar pieces, making The Natalie a stunning symbol of love and versatility.

nodes.description: This rope engagement ring is a dazzling twist on the classic solitaire. Intertwining strands of metal go around the finger, turning into 4 claws. Inside these claws is a dainty basket with a hidden halo - and the center stone itself. This ring breathes modernity and refinement. Finished by hand.

nodes.title: Double Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Similar to the single claw prongs but two prongs sit closely next to each other for extra protection.

nodes.title: Two-Tone
nodes.descriptionHtml: Create a unique look by mixing two metals. The head will be made in white gold and the band in your chosen metal.

nodes.title: Euro Shank
nodes.descriptionHtml: A modern squared base for comfortable, stylish wear.

nodes.title: Pave Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra sparkle to your setting with diamonds on the prongs.

nodes.title: 2.5mm Band
nodes.descriptionHtml: Customize the band's width to your preference.

nodes.title: 6 Prongs (Round)
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: Remove Hidden Halo
nodes.descriptionHtml: Remove the feature of smaller diamonds underneath the center stone (The setting design won’t change).

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: Compass
nodes.descriptionHtml: A compass prong setting has four prongs aligned with the cardinal directions, highlighting the stone's beauty.

nodes.title: Bezel
nodes.descriptionHtml: A bezel setting surrounds the stone with a metal rim, providing a secure and modern look.
